content: 1/4 crochet cheeseburger pattern version 1 nov 2008 supplies needed worsted yarn scraps polyfill wool batting or other filler size h crochet hook yarn needle gage is not important just keep consistent through out original purchasers only may sew and sell up to 50 items a year from this pattern please give credit to me by including the item name cuddlebub creations crochet cheeseburger in your on line listing title and link to my website www cuddlebubcreations com the following text should accompany your listing item created with pattern from cuddlebub creations this and other patterns may be found at www cuddlebubcreations com pattern creator allows limited crocheting and selling from pattern designs this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa 2/4 cheeseburger pattern the cheeseburger is worked in the round make sure to mark the beginning of the round with a stitch marker with beige yarn bun make 3 round 1 chain 2 7hdc in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 do not turn counts as first half_double_crochet now and through out half_double_crochet in the same stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to join the round 16 half_double_crochet total round 3 chain 3 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 24 half_double_crochet total round 4 chain 3 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 32 half_double_crochet total round 5 chain 3 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 40 half_double_crochet total finish off leaving a long tail for sewing the pieces together top of bun round 1 chain 2 7hdc in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet now and through out half_double_crochet in the same stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to join the round 16 half_double_crochet total round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 24 half_double_crochet total this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa 3/4 round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next
